document.heading: Bad Actor Debarment and Suspension Amendment Act of 2012

history.narrative: Law 19-298, the “Bad Actor Debarment and Suspension Amendment Act of 2012,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 19-701. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on Dec. 4, 2012 and Dec. 18, 2012, respectively. Returned without signature from the Mayor on Feb. 5, 2013, it was assigned Act No. 19-666 and transmitted to Congress for its review. D.C. Law 19-298 became effective on Apr. 27, 2013.
